short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract Facebook Post and Video Comments, Export Facebook post comment list to CSV / Excel file.

ðŸ”¥ FEATURES
- Ability to export a list of comments from any Facebook post.
- Extract comments from posts and videos.
- Extract comments from User Feeds.
- Extract comments from Page Feeds.
- Extract comments from Group Feeds.
- Save and download comment lists in CSV/EXCEL/JSON formats.
- Automatic error handling included.

HOW TO USE?
1. Paste the Facebook Post Link or Post ID.
2. Click the "Start Extracting" button to begin the export process.
